Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.providers

Interface ISmintIoApiClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
SmintIoApiClientImpl
public interface ISmintIoApiClient
Implementing classes utilize the Smint.io CLAPI consumer core library to access Smint.io API and provide sync data.

The data to be synchronized by ISyncJob need to be fetched from the Smint.io RESTful API. This is done by implementing classes - usually utilizing the available Smint.io Client API Consumer Library.

  • Method Details

    • getGenericMetadata

      ISmintIoGenericMetadata getGenericMetadata() throws io.smint.clapi.consumer.generated.ApiException
      Retrieves all meta data from the Smint.io API server that is to be synchronized to the target.
      Returns:
      Might be null in case no data can be retrieved from the server.
      Throws:
      io.smint.clapi.consumer.generated.ApiException - in case calling the Smint.io platform RESTful API failed.

    • getAssets

      ISmintIoApiDataWithContinuation<ISmintIoAsset[]> getAssets(String continuationUuid, boolean includeCoundAssets, boolean includeBinaryUpdates) throws io.smint.clapi.consumer.generated.ApiException
      Retrieves all assets from the Smint.io API server that are to be synchronized to the target.

      The data is retrieved in chunks, because the binary assets might become very big. Callers need to provide the continuation UUID, that has been returned by the previous call, to the next call. Hence continuation is "chained".

      Parameters:
      continuationUuid - the continuation UUID to send to the server to keep track on already transmitted data. Reading all data in chunks is much more responsive and much faster than reading all at once.
      includeCoundAssets - set to true in case compound assets are supported by the synchronization target and thus should be included in the list of assets to be synchronized.
      includeBinaryUpdates - set to true in case updating binary assets is supported with the synchronization target and thus updates should be included in the list of assets to be synced.
      Returns:
      null in case no data has been retrieved from the server.
      Throws:
      io.smint.clapi.consumer.generated.ApiException - in case calling the Smint.io platform RESTful API failed.
